1.text: Pom Pom is sleeping right now and i've been secretly taking pictures of them hehe

2.text: But its getting a little boring...

4.text: Hey! I have an idea. Lets train!

options.text: B-but... I want to look at trash...

5.text: Awesome! Don't want to dissapoint Master Yunli and Master Yanqing

6.text: Come meet me on the express

7.text: Oh- and i'll give you boba after!

8.text: Hmph! Fine i'll just ask Dan Hen-

13.text: Miss Himeko, do you have time?

14.text: Sorry March, working on some engine upgrades for the train.

15.text: Oh Stelle! don't forget to pick up some local coffee beans.

16.text: Curious to taste Amphoreuan coffee, they do have coffee... right?

17.text: Given the nature of Amphoreus and its peoples, it does seem likely they would have what we call 'coffee'. Perhaps, something similar.

11.text: I'll just have to train by myself. Hmph, Guess all this boba tea is for me!

options.text: Boba! Wait i'll train with you!
